itemLabel: Alfred Allen, Baron Allen of Fallowfield
itemDescription: British unionist and governor of the BBC (1914-1985)

wikipedia_page.main: Alfred Walter Henry Allen, Baron Allen of Fallowfield, CBE (7 July 1914 – 14 January 1985) was a British trade unionist and governor of the BBC.

response: *Alfred Allen, Baron Allen of Fallowfield (1914–1985), British life peer and trade unionist
